ComicInfo.Summary:
Final issue! This is it. It's all over. This is the final episode; in which Mitchell Royce takes a trip to Spider Jerusalem's final resting place for an ending you might not expect!
Mitch visits Spider in his country hide-away. The two assistants are seen taking care of Spider. Seems he's falling apart, the info-pollen is taking his physical dexterity, his memory, the most of what he can do is dig in the garden or sit and enjoy the wonderful air. Saddened, Mitch leaves. Spider, still in his chair, ponders that one percent of people suffering from the info-pollen disease recover. Then he deftly lights a cigarette and laughs wildlly.
ComicInfo.Title: One More Time
